original_text: The people will come to the temple to worship the Lord at the times of the festivals. If they come in through the north gate they must go out through the south gate. And if they come in through the south gate they must go out through the north gate. Nobody may go out of the gate through which he came in. He must go out by the opposite gate.
korean_text: 그러나 모든 정한 절기에 이 땅 백성이 나 여호와 앞에 나아올 때에는 북문으로 들어와서 경배하는 자는 남문으로 나가고 남문으로 들어오는 자는 북문으로 나갈지라 들어온 문으로 도로 나가지 말고 그 몸이 앞으로 향한 대로 나갈지며

sentences.original_text: The people will come to the temple
at the times of the festivals
If they come in through the north gate
they must go out through the south gate
And if they come in through the south gate
they must go out through the north gate
Nobody may go out of the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 문에서 나갈 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: He must go out by the opposite gate
